title: Microsoft Teams is now available on the Microsoft Store
content:
It’s taken a few years, but Microsoft has finally put its Teams communication service on the Microsoft Store, making it easier for users to find and download. Microsoft had announced it would be publishing the app on its digital storefront a few weeks ago through a listing on the Microsoft 365 roadmap, and now, it’s

The post Microsoft Teams is now available on the Microsoft Store appeared first on XDA.
description: Microsoft has announced that the Teams app is now available on the Microsoft Store for Windows 10 and 11 after it was announced in April.
